examples: Please wipe your feet on the mat.
Límpiese los pies en la alfombra.
He wiped his hands on a clean towel.
Se secó las manos con una toalla limpia.
She was sniffing and wiping her eyes with a tissue.
Ella estaba oliendo y secándose los ojos con un pañuelo.
He wiped his plate clean with a piece of bread.
Limpió su plato con un trozo de pan.
